name: ezsystems/ezpublish-legacy-installer
description: Installer for eZ Publish legacy extensions and legacy kernel itself.

name: ezsystems/ezautosave-ls
description: Content editing autosave extension for eZ Publish legacy

name: ezsystems/ezmultiupload-ls
description: Multi-upload extension for eZ Publish legacy

name: ezsystems/ezprestapiprovider-ls
description: eZ Publish REST API v1 content provider

name: ezsystems/eztags-ls
description: eZ Tags is an extension for eZ Publish, providing more functionality for tagging content objects than ezkeyword datatype included in eZ Publish kernel.

name: ezsystems/ezdemo-ls-extension
description: eZ Publish Legacy Demo Website extension

name: ezsystems/ezflow-ls-extension
description: eZ Publish Legacy Flow extension

name: ezsystems/ezgmaplocation-ls-extension
description: eZ Publish Legacy map location datatype extension

name: ezsystems/ezie-ls
description: An image editor for simple and usual image modifications integrated in the editing interface of any eZ Publish Content Object that has at least an image as attribute.

name: ezsystems/ezmbpaex-ls
description: eZ Publish Legacy Extension that provides functionality for password expiration and validation.

name: ezsystems/ezodf-ls
description: This extension enables import and export of OpenOffice.org Writer documents within eZ Publish legacy

name: ezsystems/ezscriptmonitor-ls
description: An image editor for simple and usual image modifications integrated in the editing interface of any eZ Publish Content Object that has at least an image as attribute.

name: ezsystems/ezsi-ls
description: eZ Publish Legacy Extension for server/edge side include functionality usable as template blocks

name: ezsystems/ezstarrating-ls-extension
description: eZ Publish Legacy starrating extension

name: ezsystems/ezwt-ls-extension
description: eZ Publish Legacy website toolbar extension

name: ezsystems/ezfind-ls
description: eZ Find is a search extension for eZ Publish legacy, providing more functionality and better results than the default search in eZ Publish.

name: zetacomponents/webdav
description: This component allows you to set up and run your own WebDAV (RFC 2518) server, to enable online content editing for the users of your system through the WebDAV HTTP extension.

name: zetacomponents/base
description: The Base package provides the basic infrastructure that all packages rely on. Therefore every component relies on this package.

name: zetacomponents/mail
description: The component allows you construct and/or parse Mail messages conforming to  the mail standard. It has support for attachments, multipart messages and HTML  mail. It also interfaces with SMTP to send mail or IMAP, POP3 or mbox to  retrieve e-mail.

name: zetacomponents/archive
description: The component allows you to create, modify, and extract archive files of  various formats.  The currently supported archives formats are Tar (with  the flavours: ustar, v7, pax, and gnu) and Zip.

name: zetacomponents/database
description: A lightweight database layer on top of PHP's PDO that allows you to utilize a database without having to take care of differences in SQL dialects.

name: zetacomponents/authentication
description: The purpose of the Authentication component is to provide support for different means of identification and authentication of users using different providers and protocols.

name: zetacomponents/authentication-database-tiein
description: The purpose of the Authentication component is to provide support for different means of identification and authentication of users using different providers and protocols.

name: zetacomponents/cache
description: A solution for caching, supporting multiple backends allowing you to specify the best performing solution for your caching-problem.

name: zetacomponents/configuration
description: A component that allows you to use configuration files in different formats. The formats include the standard .ini file, and an array based format.

name: zetacomponents/console-tools
description: A set of classes to do different actions with the console (also called shell). It can render a progress bar, tables and a status bar and contains a class for parsing command line options.

name: zetacomponents/debug
description: This component provides a set of classes that help you to debug an application. It provides timers and report generators for different formats that give a summary of warnings and errors that occurred within your application.

name: zetacomponents/event-log
description: Allows you to log events or audit trails into files or other storage spaces in different formats.

name: zetacomponents/feed
description: This component handles parsing and creating RSS1, RSS2 and ATOM feeds, with support for different feed modules (dc, content, creativeCommons, geo, iTunes).

name: zetacomponents/image-analysis
description: This class allows you to analyse image files in different ways. At least the MIME type of the file is returned. In some cases (JPEG, TIFF and GIF) additional information is gathered as well.

name: zetacomponents/image-conversion
description: A set of classes to apply different filters on images, such as colour changes, resizing and special effects.

name: zetacomponents/mvc-tools
description: The MvcTools component provides functionality for request parsing, routing, dispatching, views and response writing. With the tools in this component you can very easily build an MVC framework.

name: zetacomponents/mvc-authentication-tiein
description: This component provides authentication filters for the MvcTools component.

name: zetacomponents/persistent-object
description: This component allows you to store an arbitrary data structures to a fixed database table. The component provides all the functionality needed to fetch, list, delete etc these datastructures.

name: zetacomponents/php-generator
description: Provides a simple interface for creating PHP files and executing PHP code.

name: zetacomponents/signal-slot
description: The SignalSlot component implements a mechanism for inter and intra object communication through the use of signals and slots.

name: zetacomponents/system-information
description: Provides access to common system variables, such as CPU type and speed, and the available amount of memory.
